name: Avoid (itch) (Birdgamez)
description:
Avoid is a highly addicting casual adventure game in which your task is to get to the end, if there is one at all. The game offers incredibly good and fun mechanics and is a lot of fun, try to avoid all obstacles before they do, and get better and better at parkour, buy new skins with new functions and features and discover the world! A casual game with many possibilities!

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.BirdGames.Avoid

- Complete tasks.
- Get random rewards every day!
- Collect money for new stuff!
- Have fun!
